mapper.select: SELECT o.orderNumber,o.orderTime,s.userName,o.orderPrice/100 orderPrice,o.orderStatus,t.storeName, ad.name userNames,ad.phone phone,ad.area `area`,ad.address address,o.totalPrice/100 totalPrice,o.freight/100 freight,o.payment/100 payment FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON o.userId=s.userId LEFT JOIN t_address ad ON ad.`addrId`=o.`addressId` LEFT JOIN t_store t ON o.userId=t.userId WHERE o.orderNumber=#{orderNumber}
